The licensee has the right to open a Flagship Store on the Douyin EC Global platform (domain name:jinritemai.com, changes to this domain name do not affect the validity of this document) using the Licensing Brand in its store name (subject to approval from the platform), store logo, marketing materials, etc. The licensee also has the right to conduct selling and marketing activities related to the Licensing Brand's products.
